question:
What is the correct chronological sequence of the following reports?
I. Wood’s Education Despatch
II. Macaulay’s Minute on Education
III. The Sargeant Education Report
IV. Indian Education (Hunter Commission)
explanation:
Wood’s Despatch (Magna Carta of English education) – 1854
Macaulay’s Minute on Education – 1835
Sargent Education Report – 1944
Hunter Commission – 1882
